wordGroup: social desirability 社会期许；社会赞许性

sentences.en: No one questions the desirability of cheaper fares.
sentences.cn: 没有人质疑票价下调是件好事。

sentences.en: He had not at all overrated Veronica's desirability.
sentences.cn: 他丝毫没有高估韦罗妮卡的性感。

sentences.en: The uncertainty of winning provides added attraction and desirability through emotional thrills.
sentences.cn: 因为情感上的刺激性，胜利的不确定性增加了其吸引力和别人得到它的欲望。
